      • addEffectsCost

        public void addEffectsCost​(java.util.Map<AmmoColor,​java.lang.Integer> costs)
        Effects cost setter.
        Parameters:
        costs - it's a map containing the costs to add.

      • canAffordCost

        public boolean canAffordCost​(Weapon weapon,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> effects,
                             Player player)
        This method is used to check if a player can afford the cost of a mode, an effect or a combination of effects of a weapon.
        Parameters:
        weapon - it's the weapon that is being used.
        effects - it's the list of effects indexes to be tested +1.
        player - it's the player who is using the card.
        Returns:
        true if the player can afford the cost, false otherwise

      • checkCostOfReload

        public boolean checkCostOfReload​(java.util.List<Weapon> weapons,
                                 Player player)
        This method is used to find out if a player can afford the cost of reloading the weapons he wants to reload. If the player can afford the cost, the weapons are reloaded.
        Parameters:
        weapons - it's the list of weapon that the player wants to reload.
        player - it's the player that is asking to reload his weapons.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the reload has been successful, FALSE otherwise.

      • lookForUnloadedPlayerWeapons

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> lookForUnloadedPlayerWeapons​(Player player)
        This method is used to find all of the names of the unloaded weapons in the hand of a player.
        Parameters:
        player - it's the player to return the weapons of.

      • lookForPlayerWeapons

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> lookForPlayerWeapons​(Player player,
                                                             GameMap map)
        This method is used to find all of the names of the weapons in the hand of a player.
        Parameters:
        player - it's the player to return the weapons of.
        map - it's the map of the game to be saved if anything goes bad during the process.

      • lookForWeapon

        public Weapon lookForWeapon​(java.lang.String weapon,
                            Player player)
        This method is used to find a weapon from its name and the player who is using it.
        Parameters:
        weapon - it's the name of the weapon that is being looked for.
        player - it's the player that has the weapon

      • applyDamage

        public void applyDamage​(Damage damage,
                        PlayerColor shooter,
                        Board board)
        This method is used to apply damages when a player shoots to another.
        Parameters:
        damage - it's the damage that has to be applied.
        shooter - it's the color of the player who is shooting.
        board - it's the board of the game.

      • submitMarks

        public void submitMarks​(Player target,
                        PlayerColor shooter)
        This method is used to submit the marks after a shot has been made.
        Parameters:
        target - it's the target
        shooter - it's the shooter

      • wipeMarksThisTurn

        public void wipeMarksThisTurn()
        Public method needed to clear the marksThisTurn map.

      • useEffect

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Damage>> useEffect​(Weapon weapon,
                                                                  Effect effect,
                                                                  Player shooter,
                                                                  java.util.List<Damage> forPotentiableWeapons,
                                                                  Board board,
                                                                  java.util.List<Player> players)
        This method is used to compute the possible damages that a weapon can do when used by a certain player.
        Parameters:
        weapon - it's the weapon that is being used.
        effect - it's the effect that is being used.
        shooter - it's the player who is using the weapon.
        forPotentiableWeapons - it's an ArrayList containing all of the previous damages made by the other weapons.
        board - it's the board of the game.
        players - it's the list of players in the game.
        Returns:
        an array list containing all of the possible damage alternatives when using the effect of the weapon.

      • wipePotentiableWeapon

        public void wipePotentiableWeapon()
        Clears the damage that has been done with a potentiable weapon after that it has been used.

      • appendPotentiableWeapon

        public void appendPotentiableWeapon​(java.util.List<Damage> damage)
        Adds damages to the list of damages that is being done using a potentiable weapon.
        Parameters:
        damage - it's the damage that is being done.

      • getForPotentiableWeapon

        public java.util.List<Damage> getForPotentiableWeapon()
        Getter of the list of damage that has already been done with the weapon that is being used.
        Returns:
        an array list containing the damage.

      • applyCost

        public void applyCost​(Player player,
                      DecksHandler decks)
        Subs the cost of the weapon to the player's ammos.
        Parameters:
        player - it's the player who has used the weapon.
        decks - it's the deck of the game, needed to waste the powerup.

        Adds the cost of the powerups sold by a player to his memory
        Parameters:
        powerups - it's the list of powerups sold by the player.
        player - it's the player that is selling his powerups.
